Growth projections in the global economy are heading lower following Trump's tariff plans, according to Citi.
Analyst Nathan Sheets projects global growth this year will soften to 2.1%. That is down… [+891 chars]

articles.title: Each measles case in raging outbreak costs up to $50,000, CDC official says - Ars Technica

articles.title: 2,000 Years Before Modern Technology, the Greeks Had Built the World’s First Computer (So Advanced That It Still Baffles Scientists) - The Daily Galaxy
articles.description: Divers searching for sponges stumbled upon a strange, gear-filled object buried in a sunken Roman ship. What they pulled from the Aegean seafloor defied everything historians thought they knew.
articles.content: Over 120 years ago, sponge divers off the coast of the Greek island Antikythera unearthed one of the most enigmatic technological artifacts in human history. Hidden among statues, coins, glassware, a… [+5860 chars]
